Title: The Toll
Writer: Chris Mundy, Bill Dubuque (created by), Mark Williams (created by), Martin Zimmerman (story editor), Paul Kolsby (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: During his next sermon, Mason falters. Wendy and the kids are caught trying to flee their home. Marty brokers a deal between Jacob and Del.
